website_summaries.verdict: A basic but enchanting little  unicorn with classic features that appeal to a variety of age groups. One of the prettiest unicorns on our list.
pros: Boasts a long, silky mane and tail that beg to be brushed
Kids can activate light-up features and music on the brush or the body for an extra touch of magic
Simple design encourages imaginative open-ended play
Good size and perfectly proportioned for play with Barbie dolls
cons: Not the most feature-rich option on our list

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toy
customer_reviews.text: I originally gifted this to my daughter, but as she began to play with it she noticed her great grandmother (101 years old) fell in love with it! She has Dementia and loves toys, especially this one with its pink soft hair/tail and sparkling lights! My sweet daughter immediately gave it to her because she saw the joy it brought her.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loved this. It plays music. It is such a cute unicorn and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: quietcows

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Our unicorn and Barbie obsessed little girl absolutely loves this thing. It’s a pretty basic toy and I think slightly overpriced for what it does. When you put the hair brush next to it’s head, it’ll light up with sounds. That’s about it so honestly it should be more around $20 in my opinion but our girl is happy. Gave it four stars because we had some hair come out with brushing. Hoping this is just a first use kind of thing but can see it becoming a problem if not since the whole idea is to brush the unicorn’s hair. It’ll make a great gift for any kid into unicorns that’s for sure!
customer_reviews.author: A&MW11

customer_reviews.title: OHMYGOSH!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was turning 5 and asked for a "Barbie Unicorn". I looked all over at local stores and couldn't find anything of that sort. Enter Dreamtopia. OHMYGOSH. I hadn't read about it prior to receiving it, so I was as surprised as my daughter. When you comb the unicorn's mane or tail, or if you push a star on its body, lights and music play! There are three different songs, and the lights are so bright my daughter likes to sit in her room with the lights off just to watch the show. Such an incredible find, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jflo

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn fans will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected - but overall, as advertised! My soon to be 5year old is going to love it. Can’t wait to give her for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: A. Holt

customer_reviews.title: VERY FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how the heck it happened but I ordered this Sunday morning and received it on Monday the very next day! I used standard shipping. However it happened I am forever grateful because it gave me plenty of time before my daughters birthday. The unicorn is perfect and I can not WAIT for my daughter to open it. I think I am more excited than she will be hahaha. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have order this item and it came in a plastic bag with out the brush. It was for a birthday present, we are supposed to have the brush to make the unicorn to sign and light up. I'm so disappointed about this unicorn in a plastic bag with out the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Concha Morin

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A UNICORN THAT PLAYS MUSIC AND LIGHTS UP!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my two year old granddaughter only because it's a unicorn. The brush is small and can easily be lost with all the other 'parts' that two-year-olds collect with their toys. Not sure what the brush is supposed to do when you brush the mane or tail but this one doesn't do anything but detangle a little bit. We have more fun braiding than brushing. It plays music when you push a button and lights up pretty nicely when the music plays. That's all I see as play value. Nt really an educational/learning toy but cute for a unicorn.....
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kimbell-Meaney

customer_reviews.title: What a great horse (unicorn) toy
customer_reviews.text: The little girl in me is squeeling with delight everytime the button makes the stars shimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toy for my daughter's birthday last minute, literally the day before. It arrived by 1pm the next day which was perfect. It was in pristine condition, only took 2 minutes to get it out of the packaging and it absolutely perfect! My daughter is beyond ecstatic with it and I couldn't be happier! I am amazed with the quality of the hair on the unicorn. It doesn't tangle and is extremely soft, unlike most of the hair on other toys I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: MissMalicious

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year old after seeing some reviews. She LOVED it! It is as many reviewers have stated much larger than I thought I would be. This is certainly not a complaint, but was a welcomed surprise. The sound features of the item is a bit louder than I expected and there isn't a volume feature. So, you may at some point depending on your living situation, ask your young person to play with the toy somewhere else if you need a bit of peace and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the description says
customer_reviews.text: Its a gift and hasnt been opened yet, but my daughter is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No moving parts
customer_reviews.text: Would be more appealing if the limbs were interactive. Overall the granddaughter enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane McNelis

customer_reviews.title: JUST WOW!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, IS ALL I CAN SAY, WISH IT WAS MINE! MY GRANDDAUGHTER ALLOWS ME TO HOLD IT AND WATCH IT SHIMMER AND SHINE. WHERE WERE THESE TOYS WHEN I WAS A KID?
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Holt

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but my 5 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: After buying a unicorn toy without lights and sound, my daughter complained she was disappointed so I gave in a bought this as a birthday gift. Daughter was absolutely delighted. As an adult, I feel this is priced a little high. The lights and design are only on one side, the other side is just white. It only has 4 very short phrases/songs which get a little annoying after bit with no volume control. Your kiddos won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ErrJ

customer_reviews.title: This toy is LOUD
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves it, we gave one to her for her birthday this year. HOWEVER, I cannot say the same. The music they programmed on this thing is so dang loud! My toddler’s dancing Elmo is not even this loud. It helps if you put either duct tape or electrical tape over the speaker to mute it a little bit, but man, I’m not sure why the makers did that. And it’s not like it comes with volume control either.
customer_reviews.author: Móðir-lesandi

customer_reviews.title: Big sturdy unicorn
customer_reviews.text: This unicorn was a Christmas present for my daughter. She loved it. It's beautiful. Lights up and makes sounds, it's bigger than I thought it would be and is pretty sturdy. My only complaint is the magic brush it comes with does not always work to turn on the magic lights and sound, sometimes it does and sometimes it doesn't, this did frustrate my daughter but all in all it's a very nice unicorn gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pullar

customer_reviews.title: My five year old daughter absolutely loves this
customer_reviews.text: It has been great. Hair gets messy but not too bad. My daughter loves this gift we gave her. Loves the feature that it makes a magical sound when you press a button.
customer_reviews.author: Orestes G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: When shopping for her Birthday Girl picks, Grace immediately honed in on this fantasy unicorn. Upon its [earlier than promised] arrival, she was thrilled. It is a bit larger than her Maximus, so she became Maximus' mother. She also sparkles, sings, has brushable mane and tail and is all the colors of a perfect unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: sharyn sansoni

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this toy so we kept it. It’s pretty and plays music. My dislikes are the hair comes out pretty easily with brushing which is one way to make the songs go. the other is a button. I also don’t like how sharp the point is on the horn. I realize that horns come to a point but for a toy I would have liked it to be blunted.
customer_reviews.author: Hook

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my granddaughter's birthday
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 6yo granddaughter for her birthday. She fell in love with it the minute she saw it. It comes with batteries so it lit up and played a lovely sound as soon as she started bushing that beautiful mane. She never puts it down. It seems to be well made and is really beautiful. I would have loved to have had one as a child!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Smudged paint on face. Otherwise would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.text: One side of it's face the paint is smudged, so I'm unhappy. But since Santa gave this to my 5 year old, and it was the 1 thing she wanted from him. I didn't bother returning it. My kid just wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: $pend elsewhere for >play value
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Barbie extras this one is exciting for only a moment. The brush gets lost immediately unless you melt a hole in it and tie it to the horse.
customer_reviews.author: rjh

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, my daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old absolutely LOVES unicorns and horses, and to say she was thrilled with this is such an understatement. She usually gets bored with toys quickly, but it's going on two months now that she's had this and she loves it just as much as she did on day 1. 10 stars from me :)
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha CB

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t look new
customer_reviews.text: Was going to gift this to my niece for her birthday. Box has a good few bends and cuts into it and looks like it was re-taped as if it were a return. The horse’s hair was in disarray giving more of the appearance it wasn’t completely new. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kay

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a magical birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Barbie Dreamtopia Unicorn for my daughters 5th birthday and of course upon receiving it at her party she instantly fell in love with it. She loves unicorns and Barbie. Also, anything that lights up and has sound. Her horn and decoration on one side lights up when you press the button on her side. It's larger than her other Barbie horses and is also a pretty toy. Comes with a cute little brush. Neither of us were dissapointed. Also shipped and arrived quick. The Barbie box it arrived in was in good shape as well. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzee Limbach

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't do all I though yet
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!! I love it! However it doesnt make noise when I brush the hair and the batteries are really hard to get into, you need to unscrew it multiple times. That's annoying. I love the colors and sound but waiting to hear the sound go off when brush the hair!
customer_reviews.author: LilOne

customer_reviews.title: Barbie Unicorn!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's 2 favorite obsessions, BARBIE and UNICORNS, along with all other cheap plastic at a huge markup in general. She went NUTS when she opened this for her b-day. It's hard to find and I was very happy to find it here.
customer_reviews.author: Modern FossilTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Horse
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit the horse is rather beautiful. Unfortunately the brushing of the hair making music or something didn't work at all but besides that the horse is pretty and nice size. I would recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: A little loud but still a good gift
customer_reviews.text: Pretty horse that gets played with often by my three year old and seven year old. My only complaint is the music is a little loud and the hair gets a little fuzzy after brushing. Overall, would make a good gift for a girl that loves unicorns.
customer_reviews.author: Dmkaye

customer_reviews.title: Magical for a 5 yo
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old granddaughter loved the presentation with the flowing mane, tail, lights and sounds. Sturdiness to be determined since her 16 month old brother also liked it for the Sam reasons

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty ( dreamy )
customer_reviews.text: I like this toy, gave it as a present and the girl was very happy with it. It has music and lights, it's well made and very pretty, all it takes is a little imagination and let the fun begin.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Come poorly warped in plastic bag; batteries were dead and did not work well with new batteries. Looks like it was a display model not new.
customer_reviews.author: geocad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Birthday Gift Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter LOVES this unicorn! The lights are magical. We could not figure out what brushing it’s hair would to cause to happen in the unicorn and it was not explained in the directions or box. But the lights and sounds are magical and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Colorful unicorn
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute item but my granddaughter didn’t really care for it. She is six and I think spoiled. I thought the lights and music were nice. A unicorn fan would love it
customer_reviews.author: jonia

customer_reviews.title: Cute for 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and she LOVED it! But the hair got tangled super fast so we braided it instead... which defeats the whole purpose of brushing the hair!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality toy - beautiful horse
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and tall horse. Fits a regular Barbie. A bit expensive but the stars on the side of the horse enlighten when pressing on it and a soft music plays.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift Barbie dreamtopia series

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old granddaughter absolutely loved. It flashes pretty colors and makes a tinkly musical noise when you press the star. I paired it with a Barbie that had a fancy pink dress and was a bit hit.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift

customer_reviews.text: Very good size, bigger than expected. Perfect packaging. However I would have felt much better if right after I paid 40$ the site didnt change the price to 23$ 😑 definitely worth the 23$ but I'm now still out 17 bucks.

product_meta.title: Barbie Dreamtopia Brush 'n Sparkle Unicorn with Lights and Sounds, White with Pink Mane and Tail, Gift for 3 to 7 Year Olds
product_meta.description: Style:StandardLight up playtime with the magical Brush 'n Sparkle Unicorn from Barbie Dreamtopia -its body lights up and sounds play when activated in one of two ways! The lights and sounds create a wow moment every time they are played and are so much fun to repeat over and over again. To start the fun, simply brush the unicorn's mane -it's extra-long and bright pink for fantasy flair -with the included "magical" brush, or press the button on the unicorn's body. Young imaginations will be inspired to take this Barbie Dreamtopia unicorn on great adventures. Fairytale lovers can tell all kinds of fantastical stories because when you enter Dreamtopia with sisters Barbie and Chelsea, you wake up to a world where dreams become reality! Collect all the Barbie Dreamtopia dolls and toys and let your dreams set sail. Includes Barbie Dreamtopia Brush 'n Sparkle Unicorn with four light and sound shows. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: ​The Barbie Dreamtopia Brush n' Sparkle Unicorn adds magic to playtime with four different lights and sounds to add surprise and delight!
​Easy activation means kids can repeat the action over and over again for storytelling surprises and magical effect!
​There are two ways to play -- brush the unicorn's long pink mane with the included brush or press the button on the unicorn's body; however, you do it, the effect is always magical.
​A shimmery white body with cut-out color-rimmed stars showcases the lights, while the pink mane and tail and blue hoofs add even more fantasy fun!
​With so many ways to play, the Barbie unicorn makes a great gift for kids, especially those who love unicorns, horses and all animals, fantasy or real!

​Ride into storytelling fun with Barbie Dreamtopia Brush 'n Sparkle Unicorn -- collect all the Barbie Dreamtopia dolls and toys to recreate favorite scenes or tell your own fairytales and sail away with Chelsea and her big sister Barbie (each sold separately, subject to availability).
